law.catch_line: A custodian shall deny inspection of a public record or any part of a public record if:...
law.text:
A custodian shall deny inspection of a public record or any part of a public record if:
by law, the public record is privileged or confidential; or
the inspection would be contrary to:
a State statute;
a federal statute or a regulation that is issued under the statute and has the force of law;
the rules adopted by the Court of Appeals; or
an order of a court of record.
